mapper.select: select alrc.id,alrc.live_room_id,alrc.user_id,alrc.status,alri.live_price,laui.user_package,alr.live_profit from all_live_room_chat alrc left join all_live_room_info alri on alrc.live_room_id=alri.live_room_id left join live_app_user_info laui on alrc.user_id=laui.user_id left join all_live_room alr on alri.live_room_id=alr.live_room_id where alrc.status=1 and alrc.live_room_type in (1,3)
select live_room_id,user_id,status from all_live_room where status=2
